name: Equilarium
description:
Godsim physics game about literally balancing the world.

You are the god of this unstable world. Create trees, minerals, humans and balloons (duh) so that your followers can construct a temple dedicated to Your greatness. But be careful to keep the world balanced or it'll fall over!

How to play

  • Spawn trees, stones, humans and balloons by clicking with mouse
  • Humans gather trees and stone to build houses and The Temple
  • Houses only require wood and The Temple requires both wood and stone
  • Humans will decided what to do themselves
  • Use balloons to balance one side of the world if the other is too heavy but be careful as humans will use them to fly away
  • When humans finish constructing The Temple you win
  • If the world becomes too heavy on one side you loose

Made in 3 days for Minijam 97 (theme: simulation, limitation: movement is lethal).
